Disney data

22 September 2017

Back in March we took a family trip to Disneyland Paris.

I collected some data, mainly so that I could play around with styling up key figures and data tables like this…

Key figures

979 miles driven
27 miles walked
50,720 steps
7.8 hours spent queueing
6 miles buffets

Walking

How far we walked each day
Day Steps Miles
Monday 15065 6.94
Tuesday 19831 9.14
Wednesday 14818 6.80
Thursday 10006 4.60

Queue time

How long we waited for each attraction
Day Attraction Queue time (minutes)
Monday "it's a small world" 0

Monday Dumbo the Flying Elephant 15
Monday Peter Pan's Flight 10
Monday Big Thunder Mountain 20
Tuesday Big Thunder Mountain 30
Tuesday Les Voyages de Pinocchio 30
Tuesday Blanche-Neige et les Sept Nains 25
Tuesday Phantom Manor 20

Wednesday Crush's Coaster 60
Wednesday Les Tapis Volants - Flying Carpets Over Agrabah 5

Thursday Princess Pavilion 60
Thursday "it's a small world" 10
